### Cleaning the Data

#### Load Librarys

-- Load Library for reading CSV Files.

```{r eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
library(csvread)
```


#### Read PISA - CSV File

-- Read CSV File "pisa_data.csv"
-- Gets PISA Data for cleaning


```{r eval=TRUE, echo=TRUE}
pisadata_dirty <- read.csv(file = "../data/raw_data/pisa_data.csv", header = TRUE)
head(pisadata_dirty)
```
